name: Nick Solana
text: hay naku. ejk pa rin? are all killings criminal(simple  murder) in nature then if it is not through the death penalty? geez, and who first popularized the snazzy abbreviation? wasn't it anti RRD  media? i love the highlighted parts, firmly nose-in-air, don't care if i'm not rooted in fact. A one-sided opinion piece to be sure.
